document_data.name: ''Amulet of Restoration''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Amulets of restoration''''' were [[enchanted]] necklaces of [[gemstone]]s and delicate chains with their center stone mottled with age and said to had been dyed by the tears of some unnamed martyr.
document_data.Powers: The wearer of this [[amulet]] could cast the ''[[healing word]]'' and ''[[mass healing word]]'' once per day each.
document_data.History: ''Circa'' the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, one of the ''amulets of restoration'' belonged to the [[dwarf|dwarven]] herbalist from [[Baldur's Gate]] named [[Derryth Bonecloak]]. She carried the amulet along with some of her stock while gathering [[fungi]] by the [[Ebonlake Grotto]] in the [[Underdark]]. Another ''amulet of restoration'' was stashed away in the [[Counting House]] of Baldur's Gate.
